tweets.text: Hi @PHE_WestMids @EnvAgencyMids can we be real here? Residents exposure times are hours, not minutes, and repeatedly for at least 2 years. Can you accurately still say there‚Äôs no harm to human health? P.S how do you sleep at night? Because we can‚Äôt.üò¥ #stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/Y2RMaMkmJW

@MissyDoom @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL @NewsNBC @StinkStopthe @WHO @bbcmtd The chances are entirely dependent on @PHE_uk & @PHE_WestMids acknowledging that even indirect and short-term health effects are not acceptable concessions for the sake of profit. Someone attempted suicide, had they been successful, that is decidedly long-term.

Now this is the story all about how
My life filled with stink, turned upside down
And I'd like to take a minute, just sit right there
I'll tell you how we long for a town with clean air! #StopTheStink @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @PHE_uk #shameonREDINDUSTRIES #REDINDUSTRIES #landfill

The smell outside my house is that of a MAJOR gas leak but it is the STENCH from #Walleysquarrey which is already above a 6 This is a public health scandal @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @StinkStopthe #lestwedie

I wonder why only 14% of UK rivers are in good ecological health, when panorama shows that @thameswater & @DwrCymru are illegally dumping untreated sewage directly into the rivers and facing no consequences from the @EnvAgency üôÉ
https://t.co/BrOMUSo3Jy

@YorkshireWater We aren‚Äôt paying top dollar for you greedy dividend paying bastards to dump untreated sewage in OUR rivers. Regulation hasn‚Äôt worked... Renationalise the water companies for environmental vandalism. The toothless @EnvAgency are the water companies patsy #Panorama

Is this ok in the U.K. in 2021 ??   #stopthestink #stinkstopthe 
@EnvAgencyMids                      DO SOMETHING ?! https://t.co/nqNVIXeDNI
@BBCPanorama @BBCOne Yikes. I fancy watching this.

tweets.text: It‚Äôs my first day @GBNEWS üôãüèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüéâ Here we go!

Simple question @EnvAgencyMids. Why are you not monitoring air quality inside our homes? Our exposure times to the #walleysquarry gases are far longer than anything your MMF is picking up, due to the gases getting trapped in our homes whilst we sleep. #stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/PrywMHIhJg

@LTroyWritings @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA It‚Äôs appalling and the radius is getting wider , we had no issues until the start of this year. It‚Äôs now regular and the air gets absolutely thick with the times , if the @EnvAgency don‚Äôt stop this it‚Äôs going to suck Stoke in as well @StinkStopthe

11.5k complaints from one town to @EnvAgency since 1 Jan @MrNickKnowles about worsening issues with landfill fumes now causing health effects.Please help our voices to be heard by a wider audience to demand that the authorities protect our children @PHE_EoEngland @StinkStopthe https://t.co/JTWRGAKHLT

@BBCPanorama #walleysquarrylandfill has had 11.5k complaints to @EnvAgency in 2021 alone. Easily the most important environmental issue in the UK now. The toxic gases are getting into hospitals, schools, homes and causing health problems. Please help! #stopthestink #panorama https://t.co/IXfdiK4qMq

tweets.text:
@StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA I dont know if the current stink in Werrington is from the landfill, if it is the reach the smell has got is ungodly.
My heart goes out to every person nearby this horror

Kindhearted folks are donating air purifiers to help people most in need,for example a family with a poorly child who is struggling with the fumes.Amazing to see what a lovely community we have in stark contrast to @RedIndustries2 who refuse to engage with us & show no care

@LTroyWritings @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA Yep it definitely is in werrington as I just spoke to someone else who lives there . Have you complained to the EA and the SOT representative ?

It's 2021 yet @YorkshireWater @thameswater @DwrCymru & others are dumping untreated sewage into our #ProtectedRivers. It is not acceptable @EnvAgency @BorisJohnson @Conservatives. You are killing the environment upon which we depend. #SwimmingInShit #EnforceTheLaw #TakeActionNow https://t.co/0a9cD3yEaA
